name: Cosmonaut Caper
description:
Cosmonaut Caper is a single player stealth, sleuth, and stealing game where you infiltrate the private collections of stolen and black market alien artifacts to return them to their rightful owners. Try your best to be the space-faring robin hood figure this galaxy has never seen! With only 2 minutes to spare, infiltrate and recover the stolen artifacts you've been assigned to!

Cosmonaut Caper is a UW Stout student made game, made in approximately 3 months for Stout Game Expo, found online this year HERE!

Controls

  • Moving Mouse 🠂  Moves character
  • Right Mouse Click 🠂 Pick up item/Interact
  • Spacebar 🠂  Hacker Menu
  • ESC 🠂 Pause Menu
